main.name: Read A Lot
main.description: With more than 55 years of working experience in metallurgical industry in India and abroad and is actively involved with the industry as a consultant, as a resource person
main.bio: A.K.Narayanan is a diploma electrical engineer (1963) with more than 55 years of working experience in metallurgical industry in India and abroad. Even now he is actively involved with the industry as a consultant, as a resource person. For the  last 10 – 12 years he has been  working mostly on innovating the processes for the benefit of the industry. As an engineer, right from the beginning of his career he was an ardent reader. He used to write poetry in Malayalam, his native language. He is also a connoisseur of classical music and  performing arts like Kathakali, Mohiniattam etc. He is an author , having already published three  books and several more are waiting to be published. He has written lyrics for a few Kathakali stories. He is also planning to write engineering  books  detailing his innovative ideas.

projects.title: Arts of the Bachelor
projects.description: The book is about Arjun, a bachelor and his efforts to remain a bachelor against the combined forces of his sister Easwari, uncle, and a few others. Manju, Susham and Mira all are pretty young ladies eager  to marry him. Arjun wrote novels and was there a kidnapping?

projects.title: The Ghost in the Tunnel
projects.description: The book is about an adventure the five children Rahul, Radhika, Raghu, Archana and Bolu  get into during the holidays in the ancestral home in the beautiful village with its hillocks, river and an underground tunnel. Grandma tells  them a ghost story and the children actually hear foot-steps!

projects.title: Lady Bhavani and the Necklace
projects.description: The book is about Lady Bhavani’s expensive necklace. Shanks desperately wants his mother’s necklace which is locked up in the palace safe. His wife also wants  it , for a different reason. They are ready to pinch it but Lady Bhavani’s ‘ Woman Friday’ Indu, assisted by the local policeman Raghav and smart Chokku foils all attempts

projects.title: Those were the days
projects.description: A small book about the life in the village half a century back. It is almost an autobiographical

projects.title: Monsoon Musings
projects.description: About Monsoon experiences in different parts of the world, villages and cities. The book takes you through Kerala, Mumbai, Dehradun,Indonesia  etc.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
